answers.answer: Hi,I would say from what you describe, that it's an ingrown hair.  If you shave, then it's more than likely.  Sometimes when they are in that particular sensitive area, they can become quite irritated.  I've had two that have become so big they needed to be lanced by a doctor, but most of the time they go away on their own.  Personally, I dab a little bit of anti-biotic ointment on it, as well as try to keep the area clean and dry.  Hope this helps, good luck to you!
Thank you very much :) I'll do so right away.

question: For the past three days I noticed a small bit of pain where my underwear lining was. It looks like a Pimple to me but it's.. how do I put this, it's not ON my vag it's on the little connection where my left leg connects with the top of my vagina. It's to the (if i'm looking down) it's to the left next to my... um heh pee pee. I mean I managed to nick it with my nail and squeezed it, just like a pimple and well puss started to seep out.(I'm sorry, disgusting but I need help since my mom doesn't get home for a while.) I'm 16 and worried, I mean I've had sex with my Boyfriend of over a year and I know he has no bad medical history, there is a very very far in the past history of sun cancer but he takes super precautions. My mom's side has diabetes but she doesn't have it.
title: Pimple like thing by vagina
